title: Poster, "Sony Tape Full Color Sound", 1979
signed: Signed in black, lower right: Milton Glaser
inscribed: Inscribed in black, lower left margin: T-9844C; lower center: ©1979 Sony Industries, A Division of Sony Corp. of America. Sony is a trademark of Sony Corporation.; lower right: Whiteprint Editions, Ltd.
description: Poster depicts a sheet of music, colored with tiny landscapes in between measures. Text in black, lower center: Sony Tape. Full Color Sound.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "Sony Tape Full Color Sound", 1979.
1979. Gift of Various Donors. 1981-29-27.
